block.p: NOORANI-Nady. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Park East Day School mourns the passing of our devoted parent, Nady Noorani, beloved wife of Raphael, mother of our students, Daniella, Benjamin and Ethan. Deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier, Dean Rabbi Fred Hyman, Asst to Dean Marilyn Meltzer, Principal of English Studies Sara Platovsky, Principal Harriet Ingber, Director of Early Childhood
